Telemedicine: Consult with doctors remotely through video calls or chatbots.
Alternative medicine: Explore alternative medicine practices, such as acupuncture, herbal medicine, and yoga, to maintain overall health.
Emergency preparedness: Stock up on essential medical supplies, such as first aid kits and over-the-counter medications, to handle minor injuries and illnesses.
Community support: Establish a network of friends, family, and neighbors who can provide support and assistance in case of emergencies.
Health education: Educate oneself about common health issues and their prevention and treatment, to better understand and manage one's health.
